title: The Stone Monkey's Birth
concept_prompt: The birth of Sun Wukong from a mystical stone on Flower-Fruit Mountain.

title: The Waterfall Cave
concept_prompt: Wukong leads the monkeys through the waterfall to find their new home.

title: The Quest for Immortality
concept_prompt: Wukong travels across the seas to find Master Subhuti and learn magic.

title: The 72 Transformations
concept_prompt: Wukong masters the art of transformation and cloud-somersaulting.

title: The Dragon King's Staff
concept_prompt: Wukong visits the Eastern Sea Dragon King to claim the Ruyi Jingu Bang.

title: The Book of Life and Death
concept_prompt: Wukong enters the Underworld and erases his name from the scrolls of mortality.

title: The Great Sage Equal to Heaven
concept_prompt: Wukong demands respect from the Jade Emperor and takes a title in heaven.

title: The Heavenly Peach Garden
concept_prompt: Wukong's mischief at the Peach Banquet leading to chaos in heaven.

title: Havoc in Heaven
concept_prompt: Wukong fights the 100,000 celestial soldiers single-handedly.

title: The Five Finger Mountain
concept_prompt: Buddha traps the rebellious Wukong under a mountain for 500 years.

title: The Monk's Journey
concept_prompt: Tang Sanzang receives the mission from Guan Yin to fetch the scriptures.

title: The White Dragon Horse
concept_prompt: Wukong and the Monk meet a dragon prince who becomes their steed.

title: The Gao Village Rescue
concept_prompt: Wukong meets and recruits the gluttonous Zhu Bajie.

title: The Flowing Sands River
concept_prompt: The team battles and eventually recruits the quiet warrior Sha Wujing.

title: The Ginseng Fruit Incident
concept_prompt: The disciples get into trouble at the Temple of Five Immortals.

title: Three Strikes at the Bone Demon
concept_prompt: Wukong sees through the disguises of the White Bone Demon.

title: The Red Boy's Fire
concept_prompt: The team faces the True Fire of Samadhi from the formidable Red Boy.

title: The Kingdom of Women
concept_prompt: A challenging stop in a land where the group must escape tricky enchantments.

title: The True and False Monkey King
concept_prompt: A duplicate monkey appears, and only Buddha can tell them apart.

title: Reaching the Western Heaven
concept_prompt: The final arrival at Vulture Peak and receiving the true scriptures.
